README.md

# Vendor & Tooling Budget Tracker

A comprehensive web-based tool for tracking vendor contracts, software subscriptions, and consultation costs with renewal analysis and export functionality.

## Features

- **Tooling & Software Tracking**
  - Add tools with contract type (new/renewal)
  - Automatic renewal analysis with cost increase calculations
  - License tracking and annual cost management
  - Visual contract timeline

- **Vendor & Consultant Management**
  - Track consulting contracts and service providers
  - Automatic monthly rate calculations
  - Service type categorization
  - Notes for additional contract details

- **Budget Overview & Analysis**
  - Real-time budget summaries across all categories
  - Combined annual budget calculations
  - Monthly cost averaging

- **Data Export**
  - Export tools data to CSV
  - Export vendor data to CSV  
  - Combined export with both datasets
  - Spreadsheet-ready format for further analysis

## Installation

1. Download all files to your web server directory
2. Ensure the following file structure:
   ```
   /vendor-tracker/
   ├── index.html
   ├── styles.css
   ├── script.js
   └── README.md
   ```
3. Open index.html in a web browser or upload to your web server

## File Structure

- `index.html` - Main application interface with three-tab layout
- `styles.css` - Complete styling with brand colors (#8F1F57, #DD388B, #F5DEEA)
